src:
Vučić: Odnos sa koalicionim partnerima jedna od tema Predsedništva SNS, ali ne najvažnija. Na izbore sa mladim i neukaljanim ljudima

04 Nov 2019, 16:40






























Predsednik Srbije i Srpske napredne stranke (SNS) Aleksandar Vučić izjavio je večeras da će na sednici Predsedništva SNS razgovarati prvo o samoj partiji, i problemima u zemlji, a da će jedna od tačaka dnevnog reda biti i odnosi sa koalicionim partnerima.Vučić je novinarima ispred stranačkih prostorija pred početak sednice rekao da odnos sa koalicionim partnerima jeste tema, ali ne najvažnija.Upitan da li se slaže sa članovima SNS koji smatraju da predstavnici Socijalističke partije Srbije "ne rade ništa dok on trpi napade", Vučić je rekao da su u nečemu u pravu, ali i da bi "bilo dobro da pogledaju sebe i vide koliko su se oni isprsili da se bore". Vučić: SNS na izbore u martu izlazi sa mladim i neukaljanim ljudima Srpska napredna stranka (SNS) izaći će na predstojeće parlamentarne, pokrajinske i lokalne izbore sa više novih mladih i neukaljanih lica, izjavio je večeras predsednik Srbije i Srpske napredne stranke (SNS) Aleksandar Vučić.On je novinarima posle sednice Predsedništva stranke rekao da će na izbornoj listi za republičke poslanike biti 20 posto mladih i neukaljanih i da takve ljude žele i na listama na lokalu i pokrajini.Vučić je kazao da prljava kampanja koja se vodi protiv funkcionera SNS ostavlja trag za sobom i da je zato potrebno da uvode "mladu krv", koja može da novim tempom vodi u dobrom smeru i da dobre rezultate."Naši ciljevi su jasni i nedvosmisleni. Mi ćemo izaći najverovatnije krajem marta na izbore, to su redovni parlamentarni, pokrajinski i lokalni izbori sa ciljem da pokušamo da uverimo narod da smo radili marljivo, teško i naporno i odgovorno i da smo donosili ispravne i dobre odluke", rekao je VučićOn je napomenuo da je Srbija čak i na Duing biznis listi Srbija jedina u Jugoistočnoj Evropi koja je napredovala i da je rezultat dobrog rada to što Srbija u novembru značajno prelazi BiH po prosečnim primanjima, a sustiže i Crnu Goru."Sve to smo uspeli zahvaljujući ogromnoj volji naših gradjana koji su razumeli teške reforme", rekao je Vučić.Rekao je da ne želi da govori o koalicionim partnerima već pre svega o sebi jer sebe žele da menjaju.On je dodao da funkcioneri moraju svaki dan da razgovaraju sa gradjanima i slušaju šta im oni govore i misle.Vučić je kazao da je na sednici Predsedništva analizirali situaciju na Kosovu i čemu je sve Srbija izložena po pitanju očuvanja slobode i vojne neutralnosti. Vučić: Srbija neće biti lak plen Predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić izjavio je večeras da će Srbija čuvati mir i stabilnosti, ali će imati snažnu vojsku kao i da Srbija neće bit lak plen."Naše oružje i orudje je defanzivno", rekao je Vučić posle sednice Predsedništva SNS odgovarajući na pitanje novinara o naoružanju.On je rekao da su neki pre dva dana govorili o tome da Srbija kupuje "stare kante", a danas pričaju da se Srbiji preti sankcijama, jer se kupuje sofisticirano oružje iz Rusije.On je istakao da Srbija pametno kupuje oružje.Govoreći o sastanku sa specijalnim izaslanikom SAD Metju Palmerom on je kazao da u Srbiji mogu biti ponosni "zbog jedne sitnice" zato što je govorio stvari koje niko od bivših srpskih zvaničnika nije govorio predstavnicima SAD.On je kazao i da razgovor sa Palmerom nije bilo lak ni za njega ni za Palmera.Govoreći o predsedniku opštine Stari grad Marku Bastaću i umešanosti u korupciju i mučenje Vučić je rekao da je Bastać uzimao pare i za prodaju kokica u centru grada."Takvog kriminalca majka teško radja", kazao je oni dodao da Bastać uzimao novac za geronto domaćice i dečije predstave."Šta bi bilo kada bi to radio neko iz SNS", upitao je Vučić i dodao da očekuje od policije i tužilaštva da rade svoj posao. Vučić: Skupština SNS-a najverovatnije posle izbora, uskoro neću biti predsednik SNS-a Predsednik Srbije i Srpske napredne stranke (SNS) Aleksandar Vučić rekao je večeras da će Skupština SNS-a biti održana najverovatnije nakon predstojećih izbora, kao i da uskoro neće biti predsednik SNS-a."Nisam novembar pomenuo ikada, to je neko pogrešno preneo", rekao je Vučić novinarima nakon održane sednice Predsedništva SNS-a, odgovarajući na pitanje o Skupštini SNS-a.On je rekao da članovi Predsedništva SNS-a žele da ona bude posle narednih izbora i dodao da će promena biti već pre izbora u pripremi lista."Da vam ja kažem, znam ja šta je N1 želeo da čuje, kada ću ja da budem smenjen unutar SNS-a, kao predsednik SNS-a. Uskoro, ali ne brinite i posle toga i ovi koji me naslede bez problema će pobedjivati ove što su opljačkali Srbiju", rekao je Vučić na konferenciji.
text:
Vucic: Relations with coalition partners is one of the topics of the SNS Presidency, but not the most important one. Choices with young and unkempt people

04 Nov 2019, 15:40






























Serbian and Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) President Aleksandar Vucic said tonight that the SNS Presidency would discuss first the party itself and the problems in the country, and that relations with coalition partners would be one of the items on the agenda. Party premises said before the session that relations with coalition partners are a topic, but not the most important. Asked if he agrees with SNS members who believe that representatives of the Socialist Party of Serbia "do nothing while he suffers attacks", Vucic said that they were in something right, but also that "it would be good for them to look at themselves and see how hard they turned out to fight." Vucic: SNS comes out with young and unkempt people in March elections The Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) will go to the upcoming parliamentary, provincial and local elections with more new youth and non-voters, Serbian and Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) President Aleksandar said tonight Vucic.He told reporters after the party's presidency session that 20 percent of the youth and non-voters would be on the ballot for Republican MPs and that they want those on local and provincial lists as well. Vucic said that a dirty campaign against SNS officials leaves a clue behind them and that is why they need to introduce "young blood", which can lead in a new direction in a good direction and deliver good results. "Our goals are clear and unambiguous. We will probably go to the polls at the end of March, they are regular parliamentary elections. , provincial and local elections with the goal of trying to convince the people that we worked hard, hard and hard and responsibly and that we made the right and good decisions "He said that even in the Duing Business List, Serbia is the only one in Southeast Europe that has prospered and that the result of good work is that Serbia significantly exceeds BiH in November by average incomes, and also reaches Montenegro." We succeeded in this thanks to the great will of our citizens who understood the difficult reforms, "said Vucic. He said that he did not want to talk about coalition partners, but first and foremost about himself, because they want to change themselves. They talk to the citizens and listen to what they say and think. Vucic said that at the Presidency session, they analyzed the situation in Kosovo and what Serbia is exposed to in terms of preserving freedom and military neutrality. Vucic: Serbia will not be easy prey Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic said tonight that Serbia will preserve peace and stability, but will have a strong army and that Serbia will not be easy prey. "Our weapons and tools are defensive," Vucic said after the session He said that some two days ago talked about Serbia buying "old buckets," and today they are talking about threatening Serbia with sanctions because it is buying sophisticated weapons from Russia. He said that Speaking about meeting with US Special Envoy Matthew Palmer, he said that they can be proud in Serbia "because of a trifle" because he said things that none of the former Serbian officials said to US representatives. He also said that he had talked with Palmer it was not easy for him or for Palmer. Speaking about Old City Mayor Mark Bastac and involvement in corruption and torture, Vucic said that Bastac took "The mother is having a hard time making such popcorn," he said, adding that Bastac was taking money for geronto housewives and children's shows. "What if someone from the SNS did," Vucic asked. added that he expects the police and prosecution to do their job. Vucic: SNS Assembly most likely after the elections, I will not be SNS president soon President of Serbia and Serbian Progressive Party (SNS) Aleksandar Vucic said tonight that the SNS Assembly will probably be held after the upcoming elections, and that it will not be soon SNS president. "I did not mention November ever. Someone transmitted it wrongly," Vucic told reporters after a meeting of the SNS Presidency, answering a question about the SNS Assembly. He said that SNS Presidency members wanted it will be after the next election, adding that the change will be before the election in the preparation of the list. Soon, but don't worry after that, and those who succeed me will easily win over those who robbed Serbia, "Vucic said at the conference.
